description: Replaces the metadata of an app.

metadata.description: Edited metadata of the app or deployment slot. See example.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

slot.description: Name of the deployment slot. If a slot is not specified, the API will update the metadata for the production slot.

subscription_id.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).
